definition: the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat, to grip or seize, as in a wrestling match
details:
noun
- the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat
= synonyms: wrestling
- a dredging bucket with hinges like the shell of a clam
= synonyms: clamshell
- a tool consisting of several hooks for grasping and holding
= synonyms: grapnel, grappler, grappling hook, grappling iron
verb
- to grip or seize, as in a wrestling match
= example: to grip or seize, as in a wrestling match
= synonyms: grip
- come to terms with
= synonyms: deal, cope, make out, contend, get by, manage, make do
